summary.span: 编码 HTML、XML、CSS 和 URL 使用的字符串。

span.span: Encodes a string for use in HTML, XML, CSS, and URL strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用类重写类，默认情况下用于进行编码和解码字符串中的类的方法，如， ，和。You can use the class to override the class that is used by default to encode and decode strings in methods of classes such as , , and . 在中类，在安全列表中找不到的所有字符进行都编码由和方法。In the class, all characters that are not found in the safe list are encoded by the and methods. 若要替换类的类中，使用注册`encoderType`httpRuntime 元素在 Web.config 文件中，如下面的示例中所示的属性：To replace the class with the class, register it using the `encoderType` attribute of the httpRuntime element in the Web.config file, as shown in following example: ``` ``` 为不同的编码方法的默认安全字符的列表，可以找到有关注释中， ， ，和方法。A list of default safe characters for different encoding methods can be found in the remarks for the , , , and methods. 可以通过修改默认安全列表方法。The default safe list can be modified by using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将除安全列表中的所有字符都编码。This method encodes all characters except those that are in the safe list. > [!NOTE] > 加上引号 ("") 围绕之前将其添加到的级联样式表生成的字符串。Put quotation marks (" ") around the resulting string before you add it to a cascading style sheet. 下表列出了默认安全字符。The following table lists the default safe characters. |Unicode 代码图表Unicode code chart|字符Character(s)|描述Description| |------------------------|--------------------|-----------------| |[C0 控件和基本拉丁语C0 Controls and Basic Latin](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf)|A-ZA-Z|大写的字母字符Uppercase alphabetic characters| |[C0 控件和基本拉丁语C0 Controls and Basic Latin](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf)|-za-z|小写字母字符Lowercase alphabetic characters| |[C0 控件和基本拉丁语C0 Controls and Basic Latin](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf)|0-90-9|号码Numbers| 下表列出了输入和相应的编码的输出的示例。The following table lists examples of inputs and the corresponding encoded outputs. ||| |-|-| |`alert('XSS Attack!');`|`alert\000028\000027XSS\000020Attack\000021\000027\000029\00003B`| |`user@contoso.com`|`user\000040contoso\00002Ecom`| |`Anti-Cross Site Scripting Namespace`|`Anti\00002DCross\000020Site\000020Scripting\000020Namespace`| CSS 字符转义序列包含反斜杠字符 (\\) 后面从 ISO 10646 标准表示字符代码的最多六个十六进制数字。The CSS character escape sequence consists of a backslash character (\\) followed by up to six hexadecimal digits that represent a character code from the ISO 10646 standard. （ISO 10646 标准。 实际上等同于 Unicode）非十六进制字符终止转义序列。(The ISO 10646 standard is effectively equivalent to Unicode.) Any character other than a hexadecimal digit terminates the escape sequence. 如果遵循转义序列的字符也是有效的十六进制数字，它必须转义序列中包含六个数字，或使用空白字符终止的转义序列。If a character that follows the escape sequence is also a valid hexadecimal digit, it must either include six digits in the escape sequence or use a white-space character to terminate the escape sequence. 例如，`\000020`表示空格。For example, `\000020` denotes a space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全列表会影响所有 HTML XML、 CSS 和 URL 编码方法。The safe list affects all HTML XML, CSS, and URL encoding methods. 某些例外情况外，Unicode 编码图表不直接对应的书面语言。With some exceptions, Unicode code charts do not directly correspond to written languages. 若要添加支持特定语言或语言组通常需要将多个代码图表标记为安全。To add support for a specific language or set of languages often requires marking multiple code charts as safe. 若要同时继续允许英语添加对日语语言支持，请使用以下语法：To add support for the Japanese language while continuing to allow English, use the following syntax: ``` MarkAsSafe( LowerCodeCharts.Default, LowerMidCodeCharts.HangulJamo, MidCodeCharts.None, UpperMidCodeCharts.CjkRadicalsSupplement | UpperMidCodeCharts.CjkSymbolsAndPunctuation | UpperMidCodeCharts.Hiragana | UpperMidCodeCharts.Katakana | UpperMidCodeCharts.KatakanaPhoneticExtensions | UpperMidCodeCharts.LatinExtendedD | UpperMidCodeCharts.CjkUnifiedIdeographs, UpperCodeCharts.None); ``` > [!NOTE] > 必须调用方法`Application_Start`Global.asax 文件中的方法。The method must be called in the `Application_Start` method in the Global.asax file.

此方法将对方案进行编码 (例如， `http:`， `ftp:`，或`file:`)，颁发机构 (例如，`www.northwind.com`或`www.contoso.com:8080`)，或查询或片段 (例如， `?v=s978dfs9#x=103`)。This method will not encode the scheme (for example, `http:`, `ftp:`, or `file:`), the authority (for example, `www.northwind.com` or `www.contoso.com:8080`), or the query or fragment (for example, `?v=s978dfs9#x=103`). 如果没有方案或字符串中的颁发机构，字符串被假定为相对路径和路径进行编码。If there is no scheme or authority in the string, the string is assumed to be a relative path, and the path is encoded. 在以下 URL 中，仅的子字符串`/default.htm`进行编码：In the following URL, only the substring `/default.htm` is encoded: `http://www.contoso.com:8080/default.htm?v=s978dfs9#x=103`
